review: Great buy if you get the deal with Sling TV (paid 49.99 for it). I only have internet at 6 Mbps and I hardly have issues with speed. Most of the few loading issues I've had was with Hulu Plus, but after unplugging it and my modem for 2 minutes and trying again, it was fine. Netflix is flawless.

review: I am a huge Amazon fan and user. The fire itself has been great. Except for one fatal flaw. You cannot restrict movies by rating. With three young kids, this is a no-brainer. I am shocked Amazon would put this out without that ability. Their solution was the parental restriction which requires a passcode to be entered before EVERY movie can be played, regardless of rating.  The restriction is available for instant video thru the website and apps on Roku, etc. So Roku has features the fire doesn't when playing Amazon content?  RIDICULOUS. Amazon needs to correct this ASAP or push us to using Roku or other streaming devices that allow us to protect our kids.
author: mcinniseast "mcinniseast"

review: I got this when it was new. Luckily amazon accepts returns for products. I did its job, but only if you are interested in amazon content. Its like having a kindle on your t.v. Nice, but limited.
